shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_b = max((1 / 3.14) + .5 * sin(time) - (2 / (3 * 3.14)) * cos(2 * time), .3);
per_frame_2=wave_g = .1 * max(5 * mid * sin(mid * time) / (mid_att * mid_att + mid * mid), .1);
per_frame_3=wave_r = max(5 * treb * sin(treb * time) / (treb_att * treb_att + treb * treb), .3);
per_frame_4=decay = .99999995 + .00000005 * abs(sin(50 * time));
per_pixel_1=zoom = if(below(rad, .03), .9, 1 - 2 * (-(3/2) * pow(2.718, sin(bass * bass * time * sin(31.4 * rad) / rad)) + .5 * pow(2.718, sin(treb * treb * time * rad * sin(3.14 * rad) / rad)))/500);
warp_1=`sampler sampler_grad3;
warp_2=`
warp_3=`shader_body
warp_4=`{
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    float2  uv2 =  uv;
warp_7=`    uv2 = uv + texsize.zx*(q3,q3)*(bass*100);
warp_8=`    float3 color = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, uv2) - 0.5; 
warp_9=`color-=roam_sin*roam_cos.wzy;
warp_10=`    color += atan(tex2D(sampler_noise_mq, uv2)) - 0.5; 
warp_11=`    color += tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv2) - 0.5; 
warp_12=`
warp_13=`
warp_14=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, ((uv-0.5)*(0.98 + rad*0.02)) + 0.5 + GetBlur3((uv - 0.5)*0.9 + 0.5)*0.1  - 0.01).xyz + color*0.01;    
warp_15=`    ret = ret;// - 0.08; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_16=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`   float d = texsize.zw;
comp_4=`   float3 deltax = (GetPixel(uv + float2(q10,0)*d) + GetPixel(uv + float2(-q10,0)*d))*0.5;    
comp_5=`   float3 deltay = (GetPixel(uv + float2(0,q10)*d) + GetPixel(uv + float2(0,-q10)*d))*0.5;    
comp_6=`     
comp_7=`
comp_8=`   ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv)*4; 
comp_9=`ret-=roam_sin.wzy*roam_cos;
comp_10=`   ret =  (ret)*GetBlur1(lerp(deltax,deltay,0.5))*5;
comp_11=`//ret=1-ret;
comp_12=`}
